question: You are a regular customer at a supermarket in your town/city. You have recently noticed a problem with some of the products that you usually buy and you have decided to complain about this.Write a letter to the manager. In your letterExplain who you areDescribe your complaintSay what you think should be done about it.
text: Hope my letter finds you well.

I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction regarding some of your products in your supermarket. My name is Melvin Gajultos, I am one of your customers. I am residing near the hospital, one street away from the supermarket.

Firstly, please be informed that yesterday after my shopping in your supermarket, I just noticed when I got home that the noodles that I purchased are already expired. I do not usually check the expiry date of your products when I am buying them in your store. Secondly, the meat that I bought is not fresh anymore, which is very alarming. Lastly, there are some products that are not available such as lemon juice and bottled milk.

Thus, I appreciated it if you could take some necessary actions for those. Maybe you need to check your inventory monthly, therefore,  you will know if you need to stock some products and  remove all the items that are already expired.
I hope my complaints will  help your business to improve.
